definition: weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: At first, no one would publish his work because of his experimental formats, but he was determined to continue writing anyway, for his own fulfillment.

sentences.english: Adaptation is a normal process of growth among children with intellectual disability and determines their level and quality in authentic life.

sentences.english: Soon the whole hillside was one gigantic, seething, cretin, mongolian and pinhead orgy.

sentences.english: For the child, music is an important approach to realize art education.

sentences.english: How do the deaf-mutes and the mentally disabled dream?
